name: TuHou Remilia - Begin Of Scarlet Family
name_original: TuHou Remilia - Begin Of Scarlet Family
description:
Play as a 100-year-old vampire at the beginning of the Big Bang to solve all the problems in the world and make yourself stronger!


When you hold down Barrage B, you can fire six magic guns, killing all enemies who stand in your way!
At the same time has a smooth operation, any time to cancel after shaking hard straight, slaughter in the 3D world!

Role play:


Play the cool vampire sister in the game and save the world together.

Npc appearance:


Along the way you will meet your sister, your martial arts master, your sister's sister, your sorcerer and your maid.

Type of crisis:


You will need to gather magic materials and step by step get stronger and closer to more serious magic crisis!

Operation sense:


Use your left mouse button to use the A attack body spell, while you can use the right mouse button to cancel the B barrage magic attack anytime and anywhere.

Mirror image:


There will be many close-ups in the game, you will get a slow motion photo when killing high monsters, and there is no code to lock your view, you can attack anywhere, anytime, anywhere, while seeing objects anywhere.

In-purchase:


This game follows ZUN's open wishes and does not set any in-purchase

Why buy now:


Buy now! With ea test price to follow the development progress of direct experience after the launch of the official version!


Move: WASD Xbox Controller - Four buttons on the left controller

Skip conversations and jump: Space bar Y [Xbox Controller]

A Attack: Left mouse button A [Xbox Controller]

B Attack: Right mouse button B [Xbox Controller]

C Attack: Mouse button X [Xbox Controller]

Treasure hunt indicator: Non-keypad 1 key View [Xbox Controller]

In the air press A: J2A to launch a downward group attack.

Press A: DA (Dash A)

Flight: Shift+WASD (space bar: upward flight)

Cancel Backshake: AAA+B attack A+B attack

Main Menu: Press F1 around an NPC to open the main Menu [Xhox Controller]

Show/Hide mouse: H key View [Xbox Controller]

Skip Video: Non-keypad 2-key View [Xbox Controller]

Short range teleport magic: V [keyboard keys] Right Bumner [Xbox Controller]

Open big map: M [keyboard keys] Right Trigger [Xbox Controller]

Manual defense: C [keyboard keys] Left Trigger [Xbox Controller]

Run keys: Shift manual Xbox map
